title: Piptris
description: A simple Tetris inspired game for the Pip-Boy 3000 Mk V.
author: @CodyTolene

meta.controls: Use the top-left knob to rotate pieces, press to drop piece instantly. Use the top-right knob to move pieces left and right. Press the front radio tuner button to move pieces faster. Press the top torch button to exit.
meta.instructions: As blocks fall, rotate and move them to create complete lines. When a line is completed, it will disappear for points. The game ends when the blocks reach the top of the screen.
meta.tip: Try to clear as many lines as possible!
